weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Choose a cell you can see but not your cell and choose a target on the cell or move away from it.move it onto the cell and give it 2 damage
specialEffect: Choose up to 2 other targets on the cell or 1 move away from it.Move them onto the cell and give them each 1 damage
weaponCardDeck.notes: The 3 target must be different,but some might start on the same cell.It is legal to choose targets on your cell or even on cells you can't see.They all end up on that cell

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 2 damage and 1 mark to 1 target you can see
specialEffect: Deal 1 mark to a different target you can see
weaponCardDeck.notes: null

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 1 damage to every other player on your cell
specialEffect: Deal 2 damage to every other player on your cell
weaponCardDeck.notes: null

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Choose 1 or 2 target you can see and deal 1 damage to each
specialEffectName: with focus shot OR with turret tripod
specialEffect: Deal 1 additional damage to one of those targets
Deal 1 additional damage to the other of those targets and/or deal 1 damage to a different to a different target you can see
weaponCardDeck.notes: If you deal both additional points of damage,they must be dealt to 2 different targets.If you see only 2 targets,you deal 2 to each if you use both optional effects.If you use the basic effect on only 1 target,you can still use the turret tripot to give it 1 additional damage.

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Move a target 0,1or2 cells to a cell you can see,and give it 1 damage
specialEffect: Choose a target 0,1or2 moves away from you.Move the target to your cell and deal 3 damage to it
weaponCardDeck.notes: You can move a target even if you can't see it.The target ends up in a place where you can see and damage it.The moves do not have to be in the same direction

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see
specialEffect: Deal 1 damage to a second target that your first target can see
Deal 2 damage to a third target that your second target can see.You cannot use this effect unless you first use the chain reaction.
weaponCardDeck.notes: This card constrains the order in which you can see its effects.(Most cards don't.)Also note that each target must be a different player

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Choose a room you can see,but not the room you are in.Deal 1 damage to everyone in that room
specialEffect: Choose a cell exactly one move away.Deal 1 damage and 1 mark to everyone on that cell
weaponCardDeck.notes: null

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see
specialEffect: Move 1 or 2 cells.This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect
Deal 1 additional damage to your target
weaponCardDeck.notes: The two moves have no ammocost.You don't have to be able to see your target when you play the card.For example,you can move 2 cells and shoot a target you now see.You cannot use 1 move before shooting and 1 move after.

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Choose 1 target you cannot see and deal 3 damage to it
specialEffect: null
weaponCardDeck.notes: Yes,this can only hit targets you cannot see.

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 3 damage and 1 mark to 1 target you can see.Your target must be at least 2 moves away from you.
specialEffect: null
weaponCardDeck.notes: For example,in the 2-by-2 room,you cannot shoot a target on an adjacent cell,but you can shoot a target on the diagonal.If you are beside a door,you can't shoot a target on the other side of the door,but you can shoot a target on a different cell of that room.

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 move away.Then give 1 mark to that target and everyone else on that cell
specialEffect: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see at least 1 moves away.Then give 2 marks to that target and everyone else on that cell.
weaponCardDeck.notes: null

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 1 damage and 2 mark to 1 target you can see
specialEffect: Choose up to 3 targets you can see and deal 1 mark to each
weaponCardDeck.notes: Remember that the 3 targets can be in 3 different rooms.

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 1 damage to 1 target you can see.Then you may move the target 1 cell
specialEffect: Deal 1 damage to every player on a cell you can see.You can use this before or after the basic effect's move.
weaponCardDeck.notes: For example,you can shoot a target,move it onto a cell with other targets,then damage everyone including the first target.Or you can deal 2 to a main target,1 to everyone else on that cell,then move the main target.Or you can deal 1 to an isolated target and 1 to everyone on a different cell.If you target your own cell,you will not be moved or damaged.

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your cell.If you want,you may then move the target 1 cell.
specialEffect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on any cell exactly one move away.
weaponCardDeck.notes: null

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see that is not on your cell.Then you may move the target 1 cell.
specialEffect: Move 1 or 2 cells.This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect
During the basic effect ,deal 1 damage to every player on your target's original cell-including the target,even if you move it.
weaponCardDeck.notes: If you use the rocket jump before the basic effect,you consider only your new cell when determining if a target is legal.You can even move off a cell so you can shoot someone on it.If you use the fragmenting warhead,you deal damage to everyone on the target's cell before you move the target - you target will take 3 damage total.

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Choose 1 target on any cell exactly 1 move away.Move onto that square and give the target 1 damage and 2 marks.
specialEffect: Choose a cell exactly 1 move away.Move onto that cell.You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there.If you want,you may move 1 more cell in that same direction(but only if it is a legal move).You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there,as well.
weaponCardDeck.notes: In rocket fist mode,you're flying 2 cells in a straight line,punching 1 person per cell

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Choose a cardinal direction and 1 target in that direction.Deal 3 damage to it.
specialEffect: Choose a cardinal direction and 1or2 targets in that direction.Deal 2 damage to each.
weaponCardDeck.notes: Basically,you're shooting in a straight line and ignoring walls.You don't have to pick a target on the other side of a wall-it could even be someone on your own cell-but shooting through walls sure is fun.There are only 4 cardinal direction.Anyone on a cell in that directions,You imagine facing one wall or door,cell-on,and firing in that direction.Anyone on a cell in that direction(including yours)is a valid target.In piercing mode,the 2 targets can be on the same cell or on different cells.

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Choose up to 3 targets on different cells,each exactly 1 move away.Deal 1 damage to each target.
specialEffect: Deal 1 damage to all targets that are exactly 1 move away
weaponCardDeck.notes: null

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see
specialEffect: Move 1 cell before or after the basic effect
Deal 2 damage to a different target on your cell.The shadowstep may be used before or after this effect.
weaponCardDeck.notes: Combining all effects allows you to move onto a cell and whack 2 people;or whack somebody,move,and whack somebody else;or whack 2 people and then move

weaponCardDeck.basicEffect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your cell
specialEffect: Deal 3 damage to 1 target on your cell,then move that target 0,1or2 cell in one direction.
weaponCardDeck.notes: Remember that moves go through doors,but not walls.
